---
title: "Statcheck Results Report"
output: pdf_document
params:
  results: NULL
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Ensure knitr and kableExtra are available
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(knitr)
```

```{r}
# Access the results passed via params
results <- params$results

if (!is.null(results)) {
  # Render the table using kable for PDF output
  kable(results, caption = "Statcheck Results Table")
} else {
  cat("No results available.")
}


# file name
# version statcheck
# identified for one-tailed tests?
```
